resources.string: When browsing media, show items (avi, mpg, wmv...) that the Chromecast can\'t playback

This application uses the following 3rd party libraries: Universal Image Loader (c) 2011-2014 by Sergey Tarasevich (Apache License, Version 2.0) | Cling (c) 4th Line GmbH (CDDL-1.0) | NanoHTTPD Copyright (c) 2012-2013 by Paul S. Hawke, 2001,2005-2013 by Jarno Elonen, 2010 by Konstantinos Togias All rights reserved (Modified BSD licence)

Supports playback of .mp4 files from local storage and from UPnP ContentDiscovery capable media servers. Local files uses a flat file listing while UPnP sources retains whatever folder och category structure the Media Server is using
